page.title: 01Gazetteer Trusham, Devon.
page.content: A hilly rural area with numerous mixed farms and a large wooded area in the North East corner which is part of the Haldon Forest. The A38 trunk road touches the South East corner and the River Teign runs from North to South through the area. The village of Trusham lies mostly in Grid 02850082 and nestles in a valley surrounded on all sides by hills. The course of the old Teign Valley railway line can be seen following the bank of the river. There are numerous minor roads bisecting the area, and a distinctly large power line crosses the landscape.
